title: 5 Reasons Why You Should Run An AI Chatbot Locally On Your iPhone
description: Running AI offline, on your own device, can be more convenient than relying on the bigger LLM AIs like ChatGPT, which are dependent on servers and bandwidth.

title: PM Modi calls for global AI compact at G20 summit; announces summit in India
description: Johannesburg, Nov 23, 2025 Prime Minister Narendra Modi, addressing the third session of the G20 Summit in Johannesburg, emphasised the need for a fair and just future powered by technology that is human-centric, global, and open-source, rather than finance-centric and exclusive. He highlighted India’s inclusive approach to technology, citing broad participation in digital payments, space [...]The post PM Modi calls for global AI compact at G20 summit; announces summit in India appeared first on Yes Punjab News.

title: Top 6 Cryptos for Aggressive Growth in 2026, With Ozak AI Leading the Pack in Potential Multi-Year ROI
description: Ozak AI leads the top cryptos to buy as Ethereum, XRP, BTC, BNB, and DOGE strengthen long-term cryptocurrency growth momentum for 2026.

title: OpenAI’s Teddy Bear Takedown: The Perils of AI Toys for Tots
description: OpenAI suspended FoloToy after its Kumma AI teddy bear gave children dangerous advice like lighting matches and discussing fetishes. This deep dive examines the technical failures, regulatory responses, and implications for AI toys, drawing from PIRG investigations and industry reports.

title: DOGE Laid Off the Humans. Now the IRS Is Deploying AI Agents
description: Months after Elon Musk and the Department of Government Efficiency stripped the Internal Revenue Service for parts and snagged as much taxpayer data as they could get their hands on, the agency is getting some support—just not from actual people.
